e_pa_to_hau.lyric: E pā tō hau he wini raro, He hōmai aroha,
Kia tangi atu au i konei, He aroha ki te iwi,
Ka momotu ki tawhiti ki Paerau, Ko wai e kite atu?
Kei whea aku hoa i mua rā, I te tōnuitanga?
Ka haramai tēnei ka tauwehe, Ka raungaiti au, e.

tau_mai_e_kapiti.lyric: Tau mai e Kāpiti te kāinga o te hunga kua wehe ki te iwi nui i te pō
Te marae i Wai-ō-rua tēnei te mihia
te wāhi i tanuku ai te whakaaro o te motu
Kia patua ō tamariki i kopaina e koe
Hei tohu ki ngā uri whakaheke mai
I te mana o tuawhakarere iho
I te mana i te wehi o Io nui...i
Tau mai e Kāpiti, Te Whare Wānanga o ia, o te nui, o te wehi o te Toa
Whakakaupapa i te nohotahi, a Awa, a Toa, a Raukawa
I heke mai i Kāwhia ki te kawe tikanga
Hei ora mō ngā uri o muri nei
Tau mai e Kāpiti te kāinga tupu
O te wehi, o te toa, o te whakamanawanui...i
Tau mai e Kāpiti, te kāinga o te kino, o te mau-ā-hara, o te kaitangata
E ai rā hoki ki ngā kupu whakapae o ngā iwi maha o te motu nei
Ko Rangatira te marae tēnei te mihia, tōna rite he marae paenga whakairo
Ki roto Kaiweka, he marae rongonui, ki runga ki raro tāwhio noa...a
Tau mai e Kāpiti, whakataretare mai ki te rangatahi e hao nei
Waikāhua, Waikātohu, e mau ki ngā mana i ngakia e koe
Ūhia mai rā te manaakitanga a ngā tūpuna kua wehe ki te pō
Hei mauri whakakaha i te hinengaro, o Tama, o Hine e pae nei

ka_oho_te_wairua.lyric: Ka oho te wairua, ka matara te tinana
He aroha ki te aroha, ka rama te rama
Ka oho te wairua, ka matara te tinana
He aroha ki te aroha, ka kaa te rama

tera_ia_nga_tai_o_honipaka.lyric: Tērā ia nga tai o Honipaka, Ka wehe koe i ahau e
He whakamaunga atu nāku, Te ao ka takawe
Na runga mai o te motu, e tū noa mai rā koe i ahau, e
Nāku ia rā koe i waiho i taku whenua iti
Te rokohanga, te Taranga i a tāua
Ka mihi mamao au ki te iwi rā ia
Moe noa mai i te moenga roa
Ka paria e te tai, piki tū, piki rere, piki takina mai rā
Te kawea au e te tere Te Kawau i Muriwhenua
Tēnā taku manu, he manu ka ōngā noa
Runa ki te whare, te hau o Matariki
Mā te rahi Ati Awa, E kautere mai rā

e_whatoro_ana.lyric: Ki a rātou o te waahi ngaro
Kia tau mai nei te manaakitanga
Tawharautia mātou i te kākahu taketake
O te mana atua, o te mana ariki
Tūturu kia Rongo whakamaua kia tina

nau_mai_e_nga_hua.lyric: Nau mai e ngā hua i hora nei!
Tūturu kia Rongo whakamaua ki a tina
Tīna, Hamui ē, Hui ē, Tāiki ē

unuhia.lyric: I te uru tapu nui a Tane

te_roa_o_te_po.lyric: Te roa o te pō e oho ai au
He rau te huritanga i konei Tūkino
Tōu hohoro mai i te hinapōuri
Ko te āhua kau i kitea atu ai
Whano rawa ka nunumi, he wairua haere
Kai roto mai te papaki, kia mau rawa mai
Hei hoa pono koe mōku nei ki te whare
Nāku i moe iho ko tō wairua tonu
Tērā te pūkohu tāiri ana mai
Te tara ki ‘Tautari, kia tangi atu au
Me tangi, me aha te makau ka wehe
Taratara rawa koe i taku tinana nei
Ka riua ia koe ngā hiwi ki ‘Tairi
Te hoki mai te manako, huri atu ai koe, ē
Kōangi hauraro i tuku mai te hiwi
Ki Ngongotaha rā, tē hōhā noa
Tāku nei titiro te puia i Whakahinga
Tū mai i konā, mā te hautonga koe
E whiu ki te rae o Tahere rā ia
Whai noa atu ana, ka huri atu nā koe, ē

toea_mai_ra.lyric: Toea mai rā te ata i Kāpiti
Engia ko te hoa ko taku whenua tupu
I kapakapa atu ai te tau o taku ate
Warea te ngākau i haere ai koe nā

moe_hurihuri.lyric: Moe hurihuri ai taku moe ki te whare
kei whea te tau i aropiri rā
I ngā rangi rā o te tuatahitanga?
He hanga hua noa te roimata i aku kamo
Nō te mea ia rā ka whāmamao
Ki Kārewa rā, au rerenga hipi
Te ripa tau ārai ki Ōropi
Ki te makau rā e moea iho
E awhi reinga ana i raro rā
Ka hewa au, e koro kai te ao...i

takapuwahia.lyric: Ko Ngāti Toa Rangatira te iwi

hongoeka.lyric: Ko Ngāti Toa Rangatira te iwi
Ko Te Heke Mai Raro te whare tupuna

he_hokioi.lyric: Kaea: He hokioi i runga, he hokioi i runga, hu!
Katoa: E kei te āputa nā o te rangi e noho ana te hoa moenga nō Whaititiri-mā-takataka
Katoa: ōna hikumārō rua mārō tonu ōna hakikau e huhu nei

kikiki_kakaka.lyric: Kīkiki kākaka kau ana kei waniwani a taku tara
Kei tara wāhia kei te rua i te kerokero
Tō peru kei riri mau au e koro e
Hī! Hā! Ka wehi au ka matakana
Ko wai te tangata kia rere ure
Ngā rua kurī kaka nui raro āhaha!
Ka mate, ka mate, ka ora, ka ora
Ka mate, ka mate, ka ora, ka ora
Nāna nei tiki mai whakawhiti te rā
A hūpane kaupane, whiti te rā!

ka_tukituki.lyric: He uira ki te rangi, He kanapu ki raro ki te whenua
Hī āha hā - ko te rite o nga iwi ka eke
Ka ngarue te whenua ka whaoko te tangata
Ko te ritenga o te aitanga a

e_tu_ana.lyric: Ko Rangituhi e titiro iho ki a Parirua
Ki te Mana o Kupe ki Kapiti motu e

iti_whetu.lyric: Ahakoa iti whetu ki te rangi
Uhia kia ngaro e kore e ngaro
Nāna i whakawhiti mai te rā
Hei tauira mō tātou o mohoa noa nei
Tēnei mātou ngā uri e mihi atu ki ngā iwi
Tōia ma rā ki tēnei wānanga
Rarau mai piki mai ki te whāriki
E Raha, nōu i arataki i ngā hekenga
Maranga e, ki te heke mai raro e
Tēnei mātou ngā uri e mihi atu ki ngā iwi
Tōia ma rā ki tēnei wānanga
Rarau mai piki mai ki te whāriki

whakatauki2.lyric:
Haumia whakatere taniwha
Haumia who made the taniwha float

Ka mate te iwi keri parepare,hei aha mā Te Whare-o-te-riri
Even if the sappers are killed what does Te Whare-o-te-riri care?

Kaua e hoatu ki te atua, me homai ki Te Kākākura
Do not give it to god, give it to Te Kākākura

Kei ahau te huka o te riri
I have the foam of the battle

Kia tūpato kei ngau te kauae runga i te kauae raro
Take care lest the upper jaw close on the lower

Ngāti Toa o te whare o Waiōrangi
Ngāti Toa were descendants of the house of Waiōrangi

Ngāti Toa Tainui kōwhai rau
Ngāti Toa were descended from chiefs of the Tainui, a tribe inhabiting many different locations

Ngā uri o Toarangatira rāua ko Tūrangapeke, taonga hoatu noa atu
Those descended from Toarangatira and Tūrangapeke make presents without expecting any return

Te inati o Ngāti Raukawa, te inati o Ngāti Toa
The extraordinary of Ngāti Raukawa, the extraordinary of Ngāti Toa

Tōtara wāhi rua he aitua
A Tōtara that splits in two is a disaster

taku_toroa.lyric: Kua hinga ngā tōtara i te wao nui a Tane
Takiri mai ko te ata i te motu tapu o Kapiti
Whaia te here Toroa ki te uru
Kua tō te rā i te aroha
Kua ngū te oro o te Kopara-tū- whārangi
ki te awa i pikopiko i whiti
ki te awa o te akeake
i Hawaiki Nui, i Hawaiki Roa, i Hawaiki Pāmamao

i_nga_ra_o_mua.lyric: I nga ra o mua noa atu
Waiatatia te waiata o mua
Aue e hine ma, aue e tama ma
Kia mau ki to reo Maori e
Aue, aue, aue.
I nga ra o mua noa atu
I mahi I nga mahi Maori
E te iwi e te iwi
Hapai ake ki runga
Tenei whakatipuranga e
Aue, aue, aue.
Akona ai te haka taparahi e
Akona ai te poi powhiri
Poi porotiti tapara patua.
Kia mau ki to Maoritanga
Ki nga taonga a ou tupuna
Tenei hei kahukiwi
Mo tou pakihiwi
Mo ake ake tonu au e
Mo ake ake tonu au e
